name: To The Top (itch) (Ardkil)
description:
Use tab to open menu, A and D to move W or SPACE to jump and aim your mouse on a grappleable object and click to grapple. The game became harder than I planned for and I didn't have the time to balance it(though It is completely beatable in multiple ways), so if you are having difficulties you can change the level you are in in the menu
this game was made for ZenoJam in a week

Music:

 Celestial - Cause

Arcadia - Kevin Macleod

Lightless Dawn - Kevin Macleod

Mellowtron - Kevin Macleod
